<<<<<<< HEAD
Miscellaneous poems by Andrew Marvell, Esq. ... Poems. Selections Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.
[5], 144 p. : port.
Printed for Robert Boulter ..., London : 1681.
First ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. "... Printed according to the exact copies of my late dear husband, under his own hand-writing, being found since his death among his other papers, witness my hand this 15th day of October, 1680. Mary Marvell"--P. [4]. This British Library copy is unique in that it contains p. 140 to 144 (containing Marvell's three poems upon Cromwell) which were withdrawn for political reasons from the book as it was published. Cf. BM. The poems relate to Oliver Cromwell. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

[5], 144 p. : port.
Printed for Robert Boulter ..., London : 1681.
First ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. "... Printed according to the exact copies of my late dear husband, under his own hand-writing, being found since his death among his other papers, witness my hand this 15th day of October, 1680. Mary Marvell"--P. [4]. This British Library copy is unique in that it contains p. 140 to 144 (containing Marvell's three poems upon Cromwell) which were withdrawn for political reasons from the book as it was published. Cf. BM. The poems relate to Oliver Cromwell. Reproduction of original in British Library.
Robert Boulter
